siteInfo.name: Velvet Charms
siteInfo.tagline: Where Art Meets Emotion — Handmade With Love

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a team of 12 passionate art students dedicated to creating personalized handcrafted items. Every piece is made with patience, care, and a touch of magic — whether you choose an existing product or request a fully custom creation built from your photos and ideas. We proudly ship worldwide, with orders dispatched from the location closest to you: Frankfurt, Germany or Constanța, Romania. Your order means the world to us — thank you for supporting handmade artistry.

siteInfo.name: Velvet Charms
siteInfo.tagline: Where Art Meets Emotion — Handcrafted with love

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a tight-knit team of 12 passionate art students who craft personalised, handcrafted items with patience and love. You can order any item exactly as shown, or commission a fully custom creation — send us photos, ideas, and we'll bring them to life. Orders ship from the location closest to you: Frankfurt, Germany or Constanța, Romania. Thank you for supporting handmade art.

christmasTheme.note: Small festive visuals added site-wide; main layout left intact.

payment.postPaymentMessage: Thank you for your payment — your order will be processed within 48 hours. We will email you confirmation and shipping information.

notes.imageLocation: All image filenames referenced are expected to be present in the site root (same folder as index.html, script.js, style.css). Filenames are used exactly as provided.
notes.giftSoapSets: All three gift soap sets were kept as requested.
notes.unchangedProducts: Products you didn't explicitly request changes for are left untouched (images, prices, descriptions).
